name: Odraz
description:
An ancient temple is beautiful 4000 years on. A 50 year old abandoned factory is grotesque and poisonous. Both are reflections of each other. Travel through the reflection to untangle an ancient mystery.
Flip the world at any moment, enter the reflection underneath your feet. Solve puzzles with objects that travel through both worlds.

Made for Global Game Jam 2022, theme "duality":
https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/reflect-7

PROGRAMMING
Stefan Vedrina
Marko Franjić

ART
Mateja Olujić
Mateja Vedrina
Mladen Bošnjak
